name: DUNNO
description:
So, this is a prototype, it's heavily inspired by the old Arcade game: Arcanoid!

You have a ball that destroys cubes and you have a platform to make the ball bounce off and prevent that he falls into the void.

It's simple and fun, this is a reimagination of that game but it's in 3D and it's endless.

Nothing more, nothing less.

This game was made in 5days, was hella fun but I am unsure if I'll continue working on it.

Check out how the game was made on my youtube channel:
